XML_node.h

00001 #ifndef XML_NODE_
00002 #define XML_NODE_
00003 
00004 #include <libxml/parser.h>
00005 
00006 #include <map>
00007 #include <string>
00008 
00009 namespace XML
00010 {
00011 
00012         class Node
00013         {
00014         public:
00015                 typedef std::map<std::string, std::string> Attribute_map;
00016                 typedef std::multimap<std::string, Node *> Element_map;
00017 
00018                 Node(xmlDoc *doc, xmlNode *root)
00019                 {
00020                         // retrieve name
00021                         if (root->name)
00022                                 name_ = std::string(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(root->name));
00023 
00024                         // retrieve attributes          
00025                         xmlAttr *curattr = root->properties;
00026                         while (curattr)
00027                         {
00028                                 xmlChar *str = xmlNodeListGetString(doc, curattr->children, 1);
00029                                 std::string text = std::string(reinterpret_cast<char *>(str));
00030                                 xmlFree(str);
00031                                 attributes_.insert(std::make_pair(std::string(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(curattr->name)), text));
00032                                 curattr = curattr->next;
00033                         }
00034 
00035                         // retrieve content
00036                         xmlChar *str = xmlNodeGetContent(root);
00037                         content_ = std::string(reinterpret_cast<char *>(str));
00038                         xmlFree(str);
00039 
00040                         // retrieve elements
00041                         xmlNode *curnode = root->xmlChildrenNode;
00042                         while (curnode)
00043                         {
00044                                 if (!xmlNodeIsText(curnode))
00045                                 {
00046                                         elements_.insert(std::make_pair(std::string(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(curnode->name)), new Node(doc, curnode)));
00047                                 }
00048                                 curnode = curnode->next;
00049                         }
00050                 }
00051 
00052                 ~Node()
00053                 {
00054                         for (Element_map::const_iterator i=elements_.begin(); i!=elements_.end(); ++i)
00055                         {
00056                                 delete i->second;
00057                         }
00058                 }
00059 
00060                 inline std::string get_content() const
00061                 {
00062                         return content_;
00063                 }
00064 
00065                 inline const Attribute_map &attributes() const { return attributes_; }
00066                 inline const Element_map &elements() const { return elements_; }
00067 
00068                 inline const std::string &get_name() const
00069                 {
00070                         return name_;
00071                 }
00072 
00073                 inline std::string get_attribute(const std::string &name) const
00074                 {
00075                         Attribute_map::const_iterator i = attributes_.find(name);
00076                         if (i == attributes_.end())
00077                         {
00078                                 return std::string();
00079                         }
00080                         return i->second;
00081                 }
00082 
00083                 inline bool has_attribute(const std::string &name) const
00084                 {
00085                         return attributes_.find(name) != attributes_.end();
00086                 }
00087 
00088                 inline const Node *get_first_element(const std::string &name) const
00089                 {
00090                         Element_map::const_iterator i = elements_.find(name);
00091                         if (i == elements_.end())
00092                         {
00093                                 return 0;
00094                         }
00095                         return i->second;
00096                 }
00097 
00098                 inline int get_num_elements(const std::string &name) const
00099                 {
00100                         return static_cast<int>(elements_.count(name));
00101                 }
00102 
00103                 inline bool has_elements(const std::string &name) const
00104                 {
00105                         return elements_.find(name) != elements_.end();
00106                 }
00107 
00108                 inline std::string get_first_element_content(const std::string &name) const
00109                 {
00110                         Element_map::const_iterator i = elements_.find(name);
00111                         if (i == elements_.end())
00112                         {
00113                                 return std::string();
00114                         }
00115                         return i->second->get_content();
00116                 }
00117 
00118                 inline const Node *extract_element(const std::string &name)
00119                 {
00120                         Element_map::iterator i = elements_.find(name);
00121                         if (i == elements_.end())
00122                         {
00123                                 return 0;
00124                         }
00125                         Node *node = i->second;
00126                         elements_.erase(i);
00127                         return node;
00128                 }
00129 
00130         private:
00131                 Attribute_map attributes_;
00132                 Element_map elements_;
00133                 std::string content_;
00134                 std::string name_;
00135         };
00136 
00137 }
00138 
00139 #endif
